250414更新日志:
新增快速搜索
搜索关键词：x:我的     小说搜索
搜索关键词：m:我的     漫画搜索
搜索关键词：t:我的      听书搜索
搜索关键词：d:我的     短剧搜索
搜索关键词：我的        根据自定义模式搜索

250416更新日志:
新增快速搜索
书籍名@来源
目前支持来源：番茄、七猫、得间、QQ、熊猫、塔读、69书吧、伪69、喜马拉雅、小米、猫眼、百度、米读、顶点、星星小说、笔趣阁22、爱下电子书、搜书神器、得奇

250428更新日志:
新增河马短剧，七猫短剧

250416更新日志:
恢复69书吧使用:www.69shuba.com
由于搜索可靠性不高，可能搜索时间较长，故不加入全部搜索，请点击69书吧搜索使用

250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

250213更新日志:
新增塔读，69书吧，笔趣阁，喜马拉雅
新增大灰狼书架同步功能(书籍详情页刷新同步)

新增小米阅读，修复登录失效的问题

250218更新日志:
新增百度免费小说，新增猫眼免费小说，新增下载提醒

250218更新日志:
新增歪瑞古德漫画

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

// 合并数据
let datas1 = [
    {
        "title": "番茄官方书架",
        "url": fqsjurl,
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    },{
        "title": "大灰狼书架",
        "url": base_url + '/get_user_bookshelf?is_bookshelf=1',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    }];

const datas2 = [{
        "title": "书籍排行榜 ٩( ˃̶͈̀௰˂̶͈́ )و",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "推荐榜单",
        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=10',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "完结榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=11',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "热搜榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=12',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "黑马榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=13',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "爆更榜单",
        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=15',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "巅峰榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&type=0',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "男频精选",
        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&type=2',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "女频精选",
        "url":base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&type=3',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "每周推荐",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&type=1',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    }];
const datas = datas1.concat(infoData, groupDatas, datas2);


function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `${base_url}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

for (let k in data) {
    datas.push({
        "title": "❦ " + k + "生频道 ❧",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1

    for (let k1 in data[k]) {

            }
}



JSON.stringify(datas);

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
//java.log(123);
let book_id = result.book_id;
let sources = result.source;
let tab = result.tab;
let book_tts = result.book_tts;
let tags = result.tags;
let role = result.role;
let last_chapter_title = result.last_chapter_title;
let last_chapter_update_time = result.last_chapter_update_time;
let word_number = result.word_number;
let status = result.status;
let score = result.score;
let media = result.media;
let abstract = result.abstract;
let book_review = result.book_review;
let copyright_info = result.copyright_info;
java.put('book_detail',JSON.stringify(result));
let info;
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key = '';

try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
        } catch (e) {key='';}
if (key != ''){key = '✅️已登录';} else {key = '‼️⛔️您还未登录大灰狼账号哦，可以点击右上角登录♨️';}
info = `  🎚当前服务器：${base_url}
🪄大灰狼账号：${key}
🎴当前来源：${sources}
🗂当前模式：${tab}\n`
if (tab =='听书') {info = info+	'🔊当前音色：'+ getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment))+'\n'+book_tts+'\n‎';}
if (`${tags}`) {info = info +  `🕹分类：${tags}\n`};
if (`${role}`) {info = info +  `🎗书籍主角：${role}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_title}`) {info = info +  `🎯最新章节：${last_chapter_title}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_update_time}`) {info = info +  `⏳更新时间：${last_chapter_update_time}\n`};
if (`${word_number}`) {info = info +  `📝书籍字数：${word_number}\n`};
if (`${status}`) {info = info +  `💥书籍状态：${status}\n`};
if (`${score}`) {info = info +  `✨书籍评分：${score}\n`};
if (`${media}`) {info = info +  `📌出版媒体：${media}\n`};
if (`${abstract}`) {info = info +  `‎
📚书籍简介：
${abstract}\n`};
if (`${book_review}`) {info = info +  `‎\n${book_review}\n`};
if (`${copyright_info}`) {info = info +  `📍${copyright_info}`};
</js>

	key = getKey(key);
 } catch (e) {key='';}

} catch (e) {
    try{
device = java.deviceID();
device_type='苹果';
}catch (e) {device = '';
device_type='安卓';
}
}

let content_url;
if (tab=='小说') {
	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}&sq_user_id=${sq_user_id}`;
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {

 			}
 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);
 try {
if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
	java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);
	}}catch (e) {}
let content = JSON.parse(data).content;
if (device_type=='安卓' && tab  == '短剧'){

let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key2 = '';
try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';}


let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source',String(source.bookSourceComment));
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media',String(source.bookSourceComment));
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>

250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}

	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'

</js>

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//如果要显示最新章节，请去除注释，去除会影响搜索速度
//if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
//	'番茄:'+fq_last();
//	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
//	'七猫:'+qm_last();
//	} else {
	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'
//		}

</js>

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.book;
//result = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(result));

burl=source.getKey().match(/([^#]*)/)[1];
id = result.id;

source_url= burl + `/cdn/book/source/${id}.html`;
$ =java.ajax(source_url);
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
$ = JSON.parse(decode($)).result.list;
n=0;//默认选择源
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;

result.new_title = $[x].new_title;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)，若书籍ID为0 (9x除外)，则为第三方网站。\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].name+'】\n书籍ID：'+$[i].internal_book_id+'\n选用率：'+$[i].show_text+' \n源地址： '+$[i].chapter_list_url+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].new_title;
	}
result.description += y
}

try{ book_id=$[x].internal_book_id; }
 catch(e) { book_id = id;}
 
 if(x==0&&book_id==0){ 
 	book_id = id;
 	java.put('book_id',book_id);
 	result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
 }
else if(x!=0&&book_id==0) {
	 tUrl = $[x].chapter_list_url;
	 result.tocUrl = tUrl+"," + JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer": tUrl}});
	}
else if(book_id!=0){ 
	java.put('book_id',book_id);
		result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
	}

result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.list;
length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	name = "🏮〖"+data[i].name+"〗🏮";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
		book_id = java.get('book_id');
		//book_id = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+).html/)[1];
    href = `/cdn/book/content/${book_id}/${id}.html`;   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
push=(title,url,type1,type2)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: type1,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
			}
	});
push("小说🌊分类",null,1,1)
	arList=["都市激情","校园春色","乡村爱情","系统异能","家庭乱伦","穿越重生","经典武侠","同人改编","科学幻想","东方玄幻","娱乐明星","历史架空","西方魔幻","贤者小说"]
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`/novel/all?theme=${index+1}&page={{page}}
`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
			push('最新🌊上架',`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0
`,1,1)

	push('收藏',`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=collect_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0
`,1,0.25)

	push('观看量',`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=view_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,0.25)
	prList=["日本漫画"]
	orList=["短篇","单本","同人"]
		prList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+1}&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,1)
	orList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+1}&category_sub=${index}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
		});

		 mrList=["韩国H漫"]
	arList=["剧情","校园","爱情","BL","奇幻","调教","乱伦"]
	mrList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,1)
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=${index+1}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page=1&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
				});
				push('全部🌊视频',`/mv/all?page={{page}}`,1,1)
     push('排行榜',`/mv/rank`,1,1)
			krList=["国产视频","日本AV","H动漫","偷拍自拍","次元萝莉","国产传媒","主播福利","吃瓜爆料","无码流出","高清AV","同人热播","3D动漫"]
				krList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`/mv/all?category=0&category_sub=${ure+1}&page={{page}}`,1,0.25)
})
//java.log(JSON.stringify(sort))
JSON.stringify(sort)
</js>

}

  java.getString(".dx-title@textNodes");

java.getString(".text-default@text");

}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); java.getElements('.toggleVolume,ul@.cursor-pointer');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/mv/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	   book.type = 64;
    java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}
</js>

  data = [];

  data.push({
    name: list[i].select("h2 a").text(),
    author: String(list[i].select("p")[0].text())
      .replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/")
      .replace(/\s/g, "")
      .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/"),
    kind:
      String(list[i].select(".status").textNodes()).replace(/[中已\[\]]/g, "") +
      "," +
      list[i].select(".adult").text(),
    word: "",
    latest: String(list[i].select("p")[1].text()).replace(/最新章节：/g, ""),
    intro: list[i].select("p")[2].text(),
    cover: list[i].select(".img-box img").attr("src"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
1 == flag ? JSON.stringify(data) : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements("#yuedu ul li a"),
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    title:
      i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
1 == flag
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
$[*]

bookSourceComment:
/*
version: 2025.0205
完善发现,添加搜索接口by河鹅和
优化搜索发现
目录乱序修复by折木
目录乱序修复可通过设置书籍变量来开启，默认关闭
发现添加最新入库，需要先登录构造本地数据
添加本地搜索，可通过构造的本地数据进行搜索，在搜索关键词前加上name:,id:,author:,tags:即可指定搜索类型，默认为搜索书名，例子：author:佚名
当前支持类型有author,category,id,intro,name,pornrate,score,status,tags,update,word,all，分别是搜索作者,分类,书ID,简介,书名,肉量,评分,状态,标签,更新,字数,全部
发现自动添加书籍到本地数据
本地搜索支持正则，例：id:^95[5-9]\d$、all:(白天|黑夜)
添加更多排序选择
添加设置每次并发数
2025.01.31 修改本地数据保存方法，不再保存到源变量
02.01 优化目录乱序修复
02.04 优化本地数据保存，将数据切分每50万个字符保存，数据网络导出最大为10M，超过10M请使用本地导出
02.05 优化生成发现方法
*/
api = [
`https://www.aaccnn.com/e/search/,{
  "body": "keyboard=${key}",
  "method": "POST"
}`,
`https://www.aahhss.com/e/search/,{
  "body": "keyboard=${key}",
  "method": "POST"
}`,
`https://www.aakkrr.com/book/${key}<,/${page}>`,
toDataUrl(key,page-1)]
v = String(checkData()['api'])
result = api[v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:2]
header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.0.0; MI 5s Plus Build/OPR1.170623.032; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/71.0.3578.99 Mobile Safari/537.36"}

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
booklist=[]
$=checkData()
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key,page,sortType]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word):/.test(key)){
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
		}else{
			[key,page]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
			type="name"
			}
			books=$.books
	for (let i in books){
    books[i]["id"]=i
    booklist.push(books[i])
    }
    Regkey=createRegExp(key)
    booklist=booklist.filter(b=>String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
  
  if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType){
  st=sortType||$.sortType
  booklist.sort((a,b)=>getSortValue(a,st)-getSortValue(b,st))
  	}
  if(!$.order){
  	booklist.reverse()
  	}
  if (booklist.length>0&&page==0)java.toast(`\n✅成功获取${booklist.length}本书籍`)
  else if((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0)java.toast("\n⚠️请先登录构造本地数据")
  booklist=getl(booklist,page);
	}else {
		result=java.getElements(".book-like a")
		count=0
		result.forEach(r=>{
			id=java.getString("href",r).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
			temp={name:java.getString('h4@text',r),author:java.getString("span@text",r),cover:String(java.getString("img@src",r)).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,"")}
			if (!(id in $.books)){
				$.books[id]=Object.assign({},temp)
				count++
				}
			temp.id=id
			booklist.push(temp)
			})
		if (count>0){
			java.toast(`\n✅本地数据新增${count}本`)
			setv($)
			}
		}
JSON.stringify(booklist)
</js>
$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.name

ruleSearch.author: {{baseUrl.match(/\/e\//)?java.getString('span@text'):""}}{{$.author||""}}
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
java.log(baseUrl)
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key, page, sortType] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
	if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word|all)[:]/.test(key)) {
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
	} else {
		[key, page] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
		type="name"
	}
	$=checkData()
	books=$.books
	booklist=[]
	for (let i in books) {
		books[i]["id"]=i
		type == "all" ? Object.defineProperty(books[i], 'all', {
			get: function(){
				return JSON.stringify(this)
			}
		}) : ""
		booklist.push(books[i])
	}
	Regkey=createRegExp(key)
	booklist = booklist.filter(b => String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
	if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType) {
		st = sortType || $.sortType
		booklist.sort((a, b) => getSortValue(a, st)-getSortValue(b, st))
	}
 if (!$.order) {
 	booklist.reverse()
 	}
 	if (booklist.length>0&&page==0) java.toast(`\n✅成功获取${booklist.length}本书籍\n当前为按${$.sortType=="pornrate"?"肉量":($.sortType=="score"?"评分":($.sortType=="word"?"字数":($.sortType=="update"?"更新":"ID")))}${$.order?"⬆️正":"⬇️倒"}序排列`)
 	else if ((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0) java.toast("\n❎本地数据未找到，请切换搜索接口")
 	booklist=getl(booklist,page);
 	java.setContent(JSON.stringify(booklist))
 	result=java.getElements("$[*]")
}else result=java.getElements(".book-like a||.grid-item")
</js>
ruleSearch.name: {{@h4@text||h3@text||""}}{{$.name||""}}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let e = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
try{
	v = checkData()
	id=String(e.select('[property="og:novel:read_url"]').attr("content")).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
	v.books[id]={author:e.select('[property="og:novel:author"]').attr("content"),category:Object.values(e.select(".categories a").textNodes()),cover:String(e.select('[property="og:image"]').attr("content")).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,""),intro:e.select('.book-desc').textNodes().toArray().join(""),name:e.select('[property="og:novel:book_name"]').attr("content"),pornrate:e.select('.pornrate dd').text(),score:Number(e.select('.score dd').text()),status:e.select('[property="og:novel:status"]').attr("content"),tags:Object.values(e.select('.tag a').textNodes()),update:String(e.select('.new dd').textNodes()[0]).trim(),word:e.select(".wordcount dd").text()}
	setv(v)
} catch(error) {
	java.log(error)
}
let chapters = e.select(".book-chapter a");
let chapterData = [];
let chapterNumber = 0;
if (book.getVariable("custom") != "") {
	   java.toast("\n✅目录乱序修复已开启")
	   chapters.forEach((item) => {
        let title = item.text()
        let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/第(\d+)(-\d+)?章/);
        if (chapterNumberMatch) {
            chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        }
        chapterData.push({
            number: chapterNumber,
            text: title,
            href: item.attr("href")
        });
    });
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.number - b.number);
} else {
    chapterData = chapters
}
chapterData
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
bookid = baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1];
sourceinfo = source.getLoginInfoMap();
sourceinfo['书籍ID'] = bookid;
if (bookid) {
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(sourceinfo));
	}
$ = _ => java.getString(_);
img = $('[property$=image]@content').includes('alicesw.org') ? $('[property$=image]@content') : "https://alicesw.org" + $('[property$=image]@content');
list = {
	               "ID": bookid,
                "img": img,
                "name": $('[property$=book_name]@content'),
                "author": $('[property$=author]@content'),
                "info": $('[property$=description]@content'),
                "url": "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl
            }
source.put("list",JSON.stringify(list));
} catch(err) {
	java.log("登录UI未初始化保存数据："+err);
	}
src;
</js>

a:"[property$=author]@content",
t:"class.fix@p.2:3:4@text##.*[：:]",
k:"class.tg@span@text##\n##,",
i:"[property$=image]@content",

m:"text.查看全部章节@href",
o:"[property$=description]@content"}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = source.key
//处理强制登录
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//自动处理验证
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("滑动验证")) {
        let headers = {
            "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 9) Mobile Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("验证Cookie：" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("检测到验证,尝试自动处理……");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "自动验证失败，请重试!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//处理重新获取文本时可能会出现的错误。
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`未获取到文本，正在重试...（当前第${retryCount}次重试）`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "重试三次仍然未获取到文本，请检查网络状况。"
}
result;
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增晴天书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和晴天书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在晴天书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

for (let [k, v] of Object.entries(data)) {
    if (k === "男") {
        for (let i of v) {
            let style = {};
            if (i.name === "全部") {
                style = {
                    title: "喜马拉雅男频 " + i.name,
                    url:  "/discover?datatype=男频",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
                    }
                };
            } else {
                style = {
                    title: i.name,
                    url: "/discover?datatype=男频&metadataValues=" + i.value,
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
                    }
                };
            }
            fxxmly.push(style);
        }
    }
    if (k === "女") {
        for (let i of v) {
            let style = {};
            if (i.name === "全部") {
                style = {
                    title: "喜马拉雅女频 " + i.name,
                    url: "/discover?datatype=女频",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
                    }
                };
            } else {
                style = {
                    title: i.name,
                    url: "/discover?datatype=女频&metadataValues=" + i.value,
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
                    }
                };
            }
            fxxmly.push(style);
        }
    }
}

JSON.stringify(fxxmly);

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//如果要显示最新章节，请去除注释，去除会影响搜索速度
//if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
//	'番茄:'+fq_last();
//	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
//	'七猫:'+qm_last();
//	} else {
	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'
//		}

</js>

<js>
let device;
let tone_id;
try {tone_id = String(source.getLoginInfoMap()['听书Ai音色填写序号']);} catch (e){tone_id='0';}
if (!tone_id){
tone_id = '0';
}
try {
    device = java.androidId();
} catch (e) {
    try{
device = java.deviceID();
}catch (e) {device = '';
}
}
`/audio?item_id={{$.item_id}}&source={{$.source}}&tone_id=${tone_id}&device=${device}`;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增晴天书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和晴天书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在晴天书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//如果要显示最新章节，请去除注释，去除会影响搜索速度
//if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
//	'番茄:'+fq_last();
//	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
//	'七猫:'+qm_last();
//	} else {
	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'
//		}

</js>

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增晴天书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和晴天书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在晴天书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : '';
Url1 = `{{get('url1','0')}}`;
Url2 = `{{get('url2','0')}}`;
Url3 = `{{get('url3','0')}}`;
Url4 = `{{get('url4','0')}}`;
Url5 = `{{get('url5','0')}}`;
Url6 = `{{get('url6','0')}}`;
Cs = `{{get('cs','0')}}`;
Sort = `{{java.encodeURI(get('sort',Get('p')))}}`;
Sort_1 = `{{get('sort_1',Get('p'))}}`;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    java.ajax(Get('url') + '/account/login');
    ck = cookie.getCookie(Get('url'));
    if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && ck.includes('user=') && Account) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        Fav1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Fav_1"));
        Fav2 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Fav_2"));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${Fav1}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav1}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的合集', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}account_details&page_target=${Fav2}&page_elements=${Cs}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('MH')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav2}%2Fcollections?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('当前借阅', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url6}${Fav2}&page_elements=%5B%22lending%22%5D${Url3}{{page}}&sort=week%3Adesc${Url4}${Fav2}%2Floans%23on-loan`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('借阅历史', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url6}${Fav2}&page_elements=%5B%22lending%22%5D${Url3}{{page}}&sort=week%3Adesc${Url4}${Fav2}%2Floans%23history`, 1, 0.45, false));
}
    MY = Get('my');
    for (i in MY) {
        let title = MY[i].split("::")[0];
        let link = MY[i].split("::")[1];
        let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
        exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
    }
}

if (Get('s') > 0) {
    var ComicId = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('ComicId' + book.bookUrl));
    var Epid = String(baseUrl).replace(/.*ep_id\"\:(\d+)\}.*/, '$1');
    var purl = 'https://www.biliplus.com/manga/?act=read&mangaid=' + ComicId + '&epid=' + Epid;
    var html = java.ajax(purl);
    if (/〔/.test(chapter.title)) {
        var title = chapter.title.match(/(.*)(〔.*)/);
        var Rtitle = title[1] + (html.includes('comic-single') ? '📡' : '') + title[2];
    } else {
        var Rtitle = chapter.title + (html.includes('comic-single') ? '📡' : '');
    }
    String(Rtitle).replace(/[📡]+/g, '📡');
}
</js>

eval(String(source.loginUrl));

var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
Headers.Authorization = ('Bearer ' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))) || '';
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
var exploreUrl = [];

    if (!cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) || cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) == '') {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('全部订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('未读订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=1&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('已读订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=2&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('完结订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=3&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        //exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/readingRecord/list?source=mh&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=0&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=1&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=2&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/filter/classify';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.classifyList[0].list;
R = `{{Get('r')+1}}`;
Cate = `{{get('cate',Get('o'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('p'))}}`;
Zone = `{{get('zone',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/filter/list?theme=${kind[i].tagId}&cate=${Cate}&status=${Status}&zone=${Zone}&sortType=${R}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tagName, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

        });

];

    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v3/comics${Ordering}${Top}${theme[j]}&limit=24&offset={{24*(page-1)}}`;

}

(function (e) {

        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }

    return Get('url') + '/api/v3/search/comic?q=' + e + '&limit=20&offset={{20*(page-1)}}&platform=3,{"headers":{"platform":"3","version":"9.9.9"}}';

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
title = [
    '最近更新',
    '连载漫画',
    '完结漫画'
];
type = [
    '/update/d30.html',
    '/list/lianzai/index_p{{page}}.html',
    '/list/wanjie/index_p{{page}}.html'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${type[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = [
    '日排行',
    '周排行',
    '月排行',
    '总排行'
];
rank = [
    '/rank/',
    '/rank/week.html',
    '/rank/month.html',
    '/rank/total.html'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${rank[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/list/';
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url));
var list = J.select('.genre') ? J.select('.genre').select('li') : [];
O1 = `\${get('o1',Get('o'))}`;
P1 = `\${get('p1',Get('p'))}`;
Q1 = `\${get('q1',Get('q'))}`;
R1 = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
S1 = `\${get('s1',Get('s'))}`;
T1 = `\${get('t1',Get('s'))}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/list\/|\/$/g, '');
    var Filter = `{{String(\`${P1}_${kind}_${O1}_${T1}_${S1}_${Q1}/\`).replace(/_+/g,'_').replace(/_\\//g,'\/').replace(/^_|^\\//g,'')}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/list/${Filter}${R1}_p{{page}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/comics';
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url));
var list = J.select('.pl-7')[2] ? J.select('.pl-7')[2].select('a') : [];
O1 = `{{get('o1',Get('o'))}}`;
P1 = `{{get('p1',Get('p'))}}`;
Q1 = `{{get('q1',Get('q'))}}`;
R1 = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
T1 = `{{get('t1',Get('t'))}}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/.*comics\??/, '');
    kind = kind == '' ? '' : (kind + '&');
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics?${O1}${P1}${kind}${T1}${Q1}${R1}page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

];

    'type=rexie','type=gaoxiao','type=danuzhu','type=dushi','type=zongcai','type=hougong','type=richang','type=hanman',
    'type=shaonian','type=qita'
];
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
Filter = `{{get('filter',Get('p'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {

JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','爱情','武侠','格斗','侦探',
    '推理','剧情','其它','总裁','奇幻','韩漫','纯爱','日常',
    '少年','大女主','异能'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/294','/tags/295','/tags/296','/tags/297','/tags/298','/tags/299','/tags/300',
    '/tags/301','/tags/302','/tags/303'
];
order = [
    'hits',
    'addtime'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
title = [
    '人气',
    '点击',
    '订阅',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
orderby = [
    '/rank/popularity',
    '/rank/click',
    '/rank/subscribe',
    '/update/{{page}}/'
];
Time = `{{get('time',Get('t'))}}`;
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}${Time}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/list/';
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url));
var list = J.select('.filter-item')[2] ? J.select('.filter-item.clearfix')[2].select('li') : [];
O1 = `{{get('o1',Get('o'))}}`;
P1 = `{{get('p1',Get('p'))}}`;
Q1 = `{{get('q1',Get('q'))}}`;
R1 = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
S1 = `{{get('s1',Get('s'))}}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = i + 1;
    var kind1 = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/list\//, '-').replace(/\/$/, '').replace(/^\-$/, '');
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/list/${O1}${P1}${kind1}${S1}${Q1}${R1}{{page}}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

JSON.stringify(headers);

if (key != ''){key = '✅️已登录';} else {key = '‼️⛔️您还未登录大灰狼账号哦，可以点击右上角登录♨️';}
info = `  🎚当前服务器：${base_url}

🗂当前模式：${tab}\n`
if (tab =='听书') {info = info+	'🔊当前音色：'+ getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment))+'\n'+book_tts+'\n‎';}
if (`${tags}`) {info = info +  `🕹分类：${tags}\n`};
if (`${role}`) {info = info +  `🎗书籍主角：${role}\n`};

if (`${status}`) {info = info +  `💥书籍状态：${status}\n`};
if (`${score}`) {info = info +  `✨书籍评分：${score}\n`};
if (`${media}`) {info = info +  `📌出版媒体：${media}\n`};
if (`${abstract}`) {info = info +  `‎
📚书籍简介：
${abstract}\n`};
if (`${book_review}`) {info = info +  `‎\n${book_review}\n`};
if (`${copyright_info}`) {info = info +  `📍${copyright_info}`};

function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}

}

if (/安全验证/.test(src)) {
    let url = source.key;
    let c = cookie.getCookie(url);
    let t=Math.floor(Date.now());
    let key = java.get('key');
    let imgurl = url + 'index.php/api/code?' + Math.random();
    let code=java.getVerificationCode(imgurl);
    url=`${url}index.php/search?key=${key}&verify=1&pcode=${code}&_=${t}`
    uri=java.ajax(url)
    c = cookie.getCookie(url);
     //java.log(cookie.getCookie(url));
    cookie.setCookie(url,c);
    result=uri;
}
result;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
//By情无羁25.01.25修改部分规则,个人用法：点登录后选择强制保持站点和随机ua(随机ua可不点)，然后打钩，搜索后过cf盾显示列表为0后重新搜索即可
25.02.16修改部分规则，修改发现规则
25.02.20修复封面
靈狐 制，可拷贝书源，更改源URL当不同源用
书架书籍与源URL绑定，如站点变动可在登录里自定义站点来避免重新添加书架
24-05-13 修复乱序
24-06-04 发现与更多模板支持
理论支持全部69网站使用，发现若错乱请刷新
24-07-02 支持更多模板，部分站点只有排行榜，暂不予适配发现
24-07-13 目录排序，支持无标记正文排序，支持设置源变量改变搜索、发现
24-07-18 发现支持筛选、单页，源变量设置可改变所有页面，优化正文标题净化
24-09-18 支持移除目录重复条目，详情页添加标签，移除正文解密、排序，登录进行源站相关设置（强制保持：强制替换站点为当前站点），添加过cf盾
24-09-20 避免因Cookie丢失导致页面被缓存无法过盾，可设置封面为69默认封面
24-09-21 添加新的封面链接，加入随机UA功能
24-09-28 修复站点目录，发现添加最近更新（如果有），封面修复改良

  • ${sl}张图${sj}
    • +${im}`; result=[rr]; } else {java.put('sshj',''); result;}

	let nm = rr.match(/\[([^\[\]]+)\]\-?\s*([^\[\]]+)(?:(\[[^\[\]]+\])\s*)(?:(\[[^\[\]]+\])\s*)?/);

ruleSearch.name:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
let cos=java.get('cos');

if (hj=='') {
	let rr=String(java.getString('a@text'));
	let nm = rr.match(/\[([^\[\]]+)\]\-?\s*([^\[\]]+)/);
	if(!nm&&cos==1) nm=rr.match(/(^.+)\s+[–\-]\s+(.+$)/);
	if (nm&&!/^3d$/i.test(nm[1])) {java.put('anm',nm[1]); result=nm[2];}
	else {java.put('anm',rr); result=rr;}
	}
else {java.put('anm','合集'); result='📚'+hj;}

result
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var scripts = document.select("script");

var result = []; // 用于存储最终的 JSON 数据

for (var i = 0; i < scripts.size(); i++) {
    var script = scripts.get(i);
    var scriptContent = script.data();

    // 匹配 self.__next_f.push 的内容
    var regex = /self\.__next_f\.push\((.*)\)/gs; // 使用 /gs 修饰符匹配多行
    var matches = [];
    var match;

    // 遍历所有匹配结果，保留最后一个
    while ((match = regex.exec(scriptContent)) !== null) {
        matches.push(match[1]);
    }

    // 只处理最后一个匹配的内容
    if (matches.length > 0) {
        var content = matches[matches.length - 1]; // 获取最后一个匹配的内容

        // 预处理：将英文逗号（,）替换为 ",\n"
        content = content.replace(/,/g, ",\n");

        // 打印预处理后的结果
        //java.log(content);

        // 匹配 "children":"(.*)" 和 "href":"(.*)" 的正则表达式
        var childrenRegex = /.*?"children.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var hrefRegex = /.*?"href.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var imgRegex = /.*?"src.*?":.*?"(.*)\\/g;

        var childrenMatches = [];
        var hrefMatches = [];
        var imgMatches = [];

        // 提取匹配的内容
        while ((match = childrenRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // 过滤掉以 "$" 开头的 children 内容
            if (!match[1].startsWith("$")) {
                childrenMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = hrefRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // 只匹配以 "/comic.*" 开头的 href 内容
            if (match[1].startsWith("/comic")) {
                hrefMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = imgRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // 只匹配以 ".jpg" 结尾的 src 内容
            if (match[1].endsWith(".jpg")) {
                imgMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }

        // 从第2个 "children" 开始处理
        var startIdx = 2; // 第2个元素的索引为12
        if (childrenMatches.length > startIdx) {
            // 按每5个children分组
            for (var j = 0; j < hrefMatches.length; j++) {
                var group = {
                    name: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5] || "",
                    latestChapterTitle: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5 + 1] || "",
                    kind: childrenMatches.slice(startIdx + j * 5 + 2, startIdx + j * 5 + 5).join(", "),
                    url: hrefMatches[j] || "",
                    img: imgMatches[j] || "" // 如果没有图片，使用默认值
                };
                result.push(group);
            }
        }
    }
}

// 输出 JSON 模板
var jsonTemplate = JSON.stringify(result, null, 4);
java.log(jsonTemplate); // 或者其他方式输出

</js>

  book.type = 64;
  java.toast('已自动开启漫画模式');
} else if (baseUrl.match(/g/)) {
  book.type = 8;
  java.toast('已自动开启小说模式');
}
let obj = {
  text: java.get('name'), 
  href:baseUrl
};
list.push(obj);
list
